title: Administrative Assistant
text: By continuing you agree to Monster's Privacy Policy , Terms of Use and use of cookies . Administrative Assistant at Jim Rowland Personnel Atlanta, GA 30303 Report this job About the Job Reputable and top ranked commercial real estate company located in downtown Atlanta seeks to hire an Administrative Assistant to support 4 brokers. This is an excellent opportunity that can open a lot of doors for your career! Duties include preparing PowerPoint presentations, Excel spreadsheets and other varied administrative functions. Qualified candidate will possess strong MS Word, Excel, and PowerPoint skills coupled with 2-3 years administrative support experience, professional image, good phone manners, and excellent communication and interpersonal skills. You must also be organized and detailed with ability to prioritize and multitask. We are seeking a sharp AA and any administrative experience within a commercial real estate/property management environment will be given preference . Bachelors preferred but not required. Hours are 8:30 - 5:30, Monday - Friday. $40,000 plus benefits including company paid "valet" parking! You'll never have to enter inclement weather as garage is attached to the building. Beautiful offices in downtown high rise! For IMMEDIATE consideration please forward your resume to jim@jrp-atlanta.com while also visiting www.jrp-atlanta.com to complete our online application. Client is anxious to fill! WE SPECIALIZE IN PERMANENT DIRECT HIRE PLACEMENT AND OUR FEES ARE ALWAYS PAID BY THE HIRING COMPANY! Keywords: administrative, assistant, real estate, property management, broker, brokerage, commercial real estate
